verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G2250><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a marriage <S%G1062><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' mother <S%G3384><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>
<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was invited, <S%G2564><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the marriage. <S%G1062><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> ran out, <S%G5302><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' mother <S%G3384><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "They have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wine. <S%G3631><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> does that have <S%G2532><s%> to do with <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> and me? <S%G1698><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> has <S%G2240><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2240><s%>"
His <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the servants, <S%G1249><s%> "Whatever <S%G5100><s%> <S%G99999><s%> he says <S%G3004><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> do it. <S%G4160><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> water pots <S%G5201><s%> of stone <S%G3035><s%> set <S%G2749><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> after the Jews <S%G2453><s%>' way of <S%G2596><s%> purifying, <S%G2512><s%> containing <S%G5562><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> metretes <S%G3355><s%> apiece. <S%G303><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Fill <S%G1072><s%> the water pots <S%G5201><s%> with water. <S%G5204><s%>" They <S%G2532><s%> filled <S%G1072><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up to <S%G2193><s%> the brim. <S%G507><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Now <S%G3568><s%> draw some out, <S%G501><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> take <S%G5342><s%> it to the ruler of the feast. <S%G755><s%>" So <S%G2532><s%> they took it. <S%G5342><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> the ruler of the feast <S%G755><s%> tasted <S%G1089><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> now become <S%G1096><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> it came from <S%G2076><s%> (but <S%G1161><s%> the servants <S%G1249><s%> who had drawn <S%G501><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%>), the ruler of the feast <S%G755><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> the bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3956><s%> "Everyone <S%G444><s%> serves <S%G5087><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the guests have drunk <S%G3184><s%> freely, <S%G5119><s%> then that which is worse. <S%G1640><s%> You <S%G4771><s%> have kept <S%G5083><s%> the <S%G3631><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now! <S%G737><s%>"

This <S%G3778><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of his signs <S%G4592><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> revealed <S%G5319><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory; <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> he, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples; <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they stayed <S%G3306><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> a <S%G3756><s%> few <S%G4183><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> at hand, <S%G1451><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> those who sold <S%G4453><s%> oxen, <S%G1016><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doves, <S%G4058><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the changers of money <S%G2773><s%> sitting. <S%G2521><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> a whip <S%G5416><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> cords, <S%G4979><s%> and threw <S%G1544><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> the oxen; <S%G1016><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he poured out <S%G1632><s%> the changers <S%G2855><s%>' money, <S%G2772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> overthrew <S%G390><s%> their tables. <S%G5132><s%>

To <S%G2532><s%> those who sold <S%G4453><s%> the doves, <S%G4058><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> "Take <S%G142><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> out of here! <S%G1782><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>'s house <S%G3624><s%> a <S%G3624><s%> marketplace! <S%G1712><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> "Zeal <S%G2205><s%> for <S%G3624><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> will eat <S%G2719><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> up. <S%G2719><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G2532><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> do you <S%G1166><s%> show us, <S%G2254><s%> seeing that <S%G3754><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> these things? <S%G5023><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "Destroy <S%G3089><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> temple, <S%G3485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> I will raise <S%G1453><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up. <S%G1453><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "It took forty <S%G5062><s%> - <S%G2532><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> to <S%G3618><s%> build <S%G1453><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> temple! <S%G3485><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Will <S%G1453><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> raise <S%G1453><s%> it up <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days? <S%G2250><s%>"
But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> spoke <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of <S%G4983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he was raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%> the Scripture, <S%G1124><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had said. <S%G2036><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> during <S%G1722><s%> the feast, <S%G1859><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> observing <S%G2334><s%> his signs <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> did. <S%G4160><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G99999><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> trust <S%G4100><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> he <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> everyone, <S%G3956><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he didn't <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> to testify <S%G3140><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> man; <S%G444><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> himself knew <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>
